content: take your hexi crochet cardigan to another level with the addition of juicy strawberry pockets stitched in red heart super saver you ll use 4 different colors and do a variety of techniques including double_crochet chain single_crochet embroidery half_double_crochet front post half_double_crochet back post and more with such a roomy fit it s sure to become a cozy grab n go favorite to brighten your day materials red heart® super saver™ stripes 5 oz/141 g 215 m/236 yds main color mc polo stripe 4960 xs/s 7 balls red heart® super saver™ 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a jade 3862 xs/s 1 ball contrast b shocking pink 0718 xs/s 1 ball contrast c saffron 0234 xs/s 1 ball gauges 12 single_crochet single_crochet and 15 row = 4 10 cm 6 rounds rnds in pattern pat = 4 10 cm
